name: Color Blasters
description:
Cooperative color blasting shooter!

1-4 player color based shoot-em-up

  • Each player is assigned a color
  • Each enemy is also assigned a color with some enemies having colored shields as well
  • Players can only damage enemies/shields of the same color
  • Run over switchers in the corners of the maps to change your color
  • Work together to achieve the highest scores!

Controls :

  • Keyboard :
  • WASD to move
  • Mouse to aim
  • Click to shoot
  • Gamepad :
  • Left Stick to move
  • Right Stick to aim
  • Triggers to shoot

Note: The downloadable versions run at a higher quality than the browser version

Also note: If the browser says that your device is not supported, try the downloadable version as it might be a problem with your browser and not your device
